name: Untitled Theater Visual Novel
description:
So, this game was made a while ago. It was a challenge that TenshiHanka gave to me, PoundToundHound, Tyangerine, and XJ.

It's about three theater kids and an wacky alien who also loves theater. Hijinks ensue.

Credits

Form design/sprites 

Minkala  belongs to PoundToundHound

Gelendore belongs to GissyEva

Lemon belongs to Tyangerine

Sedimox belongs to XJ

For music:

Each track was made by 3 out of the four members.

The rest:

Art of the main menu goes to TenshiHanka

........

And the backgrounds are just edited stock images.

(Also, I apologize to Mac users. I've tried to see if I could make a Mac version of the game but Ren'py doesn't seem to remember UTVN... :<)
